images.copyright: "Garden Tower" at Nuit Blanche in Toronto, Oct. 5, 2013 (© Lucas Oleniuk/Toronto Star via Getty Images)
images.title: Art in the city
images.caption: 'Garden Tower' by Tadashi Kawamata
images.copyrightonly: © Lucas Oleniuk/Toronto Star via Getty Images
images.desc: It’s that time of the year, when art takes over the city of Toronto from sunset to sunrise. Various public spaces are transformed into a contemporary playground of art. Along with live performances, attendees can witness a range of art projects curated by Canadian and international artists. Pictured here, is ‘Garden Tower’ by artist Tadashi Kawamata from Nuit Blanche Toronto in 2013. What do you make of this installation?

og.title: 'Garden Tower' by Tadashi Kawamata
